title: 198: The Proslogion
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The Proslogion contains Anselm of Canterbury's Ontological Argument, which is still argued about in philosophical circles today. It's not really convincing, except that it is.
itunes:author: Three hosts greater than which no host can be conceived
itunes:subtitle: This episode is greater than which no episode can be conceived
itunes:summary: The Proslogion contains Anselm of Canterbury's Ontological Argument, which is still argued about in philosophical circles today. It's not really convincing, except that it is.
